metadata.title: USN-7223-1 -- OpenJPEG vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Frank Zeng discovered that OpenJPEG incorrectly handled memory when using the decompression utility. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2024-56826, CVE-2024-56827)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7223-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libopenjp2-7 - 2.5.0-2ubuntu1.2 libopenjp2-7-dev - 2.5.0-2ubuntu1.2 libopenjp2-tools - 2.5.0-2ubuntu1.2 libopenjpip-dec-server - 2.5.0-2ubuntu1.2 libopenjpip-server - 2.5.0-2ubuntu1.2 libopenjpip-viewer - 2.5.0-2ubuntu1.2 libopenjpip7 - 2.5.0-2ubuntu1.2 openjpeg-doc - 2.5.0-2ubuntu1.2 No subscription required
